summary: This bill, the Advancing Lifesaving Efforts with Rapid Test strips for Communities Act (ALERT Communities Act), aims to combat the opioid crisis. It focuses on facilitating access to fentanyl and xylazine test strips, including authorizing grant funds for them. The bill mandates first responder training on test strip use, requires the development of research and marketing frameworks for test strip technology by the Secretary of Health and Human Services, and initiates a study on the impact of drug checking supplies, including test strips, on overdose frequency and treatment engagement.
